A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ignore audience critics who are reacting\, not so much to actual flaws in the movie (though there are some)\, but to their own anger at plot points they didn't like or expect.  Just go see it.  Not all questions are answered\, some seem to be but may not be what we think\, but that's why this is #2 in a trilogy.  Great movie\, worthy Star Wars entry.
